issues.title: Implement InitiateUnloadingEvent
issues.description: Create a new event for signaling that a shipment is ready for unloading. Fields should include UnloadingID, RequestedPallets, UnloadLocation, and EventTimestamp.

issues.title: Implement CompleteUnloadingEvent
issues.description: Create a new event for indicating that unloading is complete and the products are ready for deep storage. Fields should include UnloadingID, EventTimestamp, and an optional IsRejected Boolean.

issues.title: Implement PlaceInventoryOnSpurEvent
issues.description: Create an event to indicate that an inventory unit (MU) is placed onto a spur and is ready for inducting. Fields should include InventoryID, SpurLocation, and EventTimestamp.

issues.title: Implement RemoveInventoryFromSpurEvent
issues.description: Create an event to indicate that an inventory unit (MU) has been removed from a spur, freeing it for another MU. Fields should include InventoryID, PreviousSpurLocation, and EventTimestamp.

issues.title: Implement StartPickingOrderEvent
issues.description: Create an event to indicate that the order has been processed for picking. Fields should include OrderID and EventTimestamp.

issues.title: Implement CommenceShippingEvent
issues.description: Create an event to indicate that the truck for shipping has arrived. Fields should include OrderID and EventTimestamp.

issues.title: Implement InventoryRelocatedEvent
issues.description: Create an event to notify whenever an inventory unit (MU) is moved to a new location. Fields should include InventoryID, NewLocation, and EventTimestamp.
